content: My country people as e be say we don already enter this period wey be say we dey call ember month we know say this period dey get as Â things dey happen for we country wey be say wuru wuru and kata kata dey happen togeda with the occurrences wey Â we no expect Â for our surroundings. E for good Â say we take time hear and know some measures wey we for take curb some security challenges and maintain safety for our environment and wherever we find ourselves. Based on say man know as e be for we country, e good make i drop this one here make we take guidelines to know wetin to do for some situation wey we find ourselves so that we no go dey taken unawares and too make we for dey alert and conscious of our environment because this period nobe wetin man go loose guard dem use am shine.At first, e for good make we start with personal safety at home;1.  Try make all the entrance to your house get security locks and be locked and make you always check am at night and day before you comot for house to ensure say dem dey locked.2. Make you no dey leave keys to dey hang for outside your door when you enter Â your house.3. Make sure say fire extinguisher always dey your house more especially close to your kitchen for those of us wey dey use gas for house.4.  Make sure say your security light dey always dey on for night so that every where go dey shine for thief not to go near your place because if dem come see as every where dey bright dem go fear run because you dey alert and conscious.5. Always get flash or torch light wey you dey use for night if light no dey.6. Make you try get good rapport with your neighbor so that if anything happen you fit raise alarm for your neighbor to come for rescue. 7.  Make you take note of faulty electrical appliances for repairs and also unplug connected appliances before sleeping time or say you want to go out.8. If you can, buy a whistle and keep at home always close to you so that you can easily blow it whenever there is invasion or attack by thieves. You blow it because the sound of the whistle scares them away as it attracts attention of people to know what is happening.9. Try not to lock your small pikin for house while going out to buy food stuffs from market, as you never can know wetin fit happen while you are not around, and the kids will be trapped inside.Â  by CryptoHeadlineNewsSecurity tips for those of wey dey drive;1. Always close and lock your vehicles any time you park am.2. Close your doors and windows while driving.3. Learn defensive driving.4. No keep or carry valuable items inside your car for people to dey pass dey see am.5. Always make sure say you get fuel for tank if in case emergency happen.6. Try not to Dey Drive for night, most especially in a lonely area, as you never can know what could happen while you are driving.Â  by CryptoHeadlineNewsWith these few tips Â dropped here, I believe that one Â would be fine and also take time to develop dem.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Good topic. Well thought out. This ember period has its own unique and special way of happening to us every year. I think unlike before, it has reduced sef. Although I dey speak for my own side. Before, as I dey grow up. Wetin I know this ember period for, is for those bad things you mentioned above. So, when person tell me say we don enter ember period na so I dey shake they fear throughout those period but for now, e dey somehow fair until this year again that we are faced with a new scary trend.The trend wey dey happen now na people private part wey dem dey steal. Na wetin dey sup now be that. Whether for marketplace or for any other public place including offices now, them dey steal people private parts. E dey hard for me to believe this one from beginning but with the current situation now, I fit confirm to you say na true as he happen for Federal Secretariat too couple of days ago.For us wey dey hustle everyday to see something put for mouth. I no come know how dem want make we run am because man gaz to put food on the table. I don dey wonder whether dem dey sell padlocks wey you fit just use lock that place because I don't know any other solution to that problem.Â Wetin una dey reason say person fit do on top that matter this ember period because, truth be told, I'm scared of going out these days even when I have no choice than to go outside and fend for what to eat.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: It baffles me how people just scrap out some months of the year as more important month than the others. Until we change our narrative towards this so called months of trying to meet up target that will eventually lead to danger or loss of lives and properties, the better for us. Over the years, not only in our country but all over most countries they take ember months so serious to the extent that if you are not making efforts to meet up Christmas stuffs like others it will look as if you're the most lazy or unserious person in life. You see people running helter scatter just to meet up during this period. Some people even call it ,,,"rush hour" tell me what makes it a rush hour that people try every means to meet up, people drive carelessly and recklessly.It's about time we stopped this assertion of Christ being born on Christmas day after all Christ never celebrated his birthday while on earth. So there is absolutely nothing too special about ember months it's just the way people take this months so serious that makes it look as if there's something too special about those months. The most funny part is that after the so called ember months, as soon as we enter new year everywhere becomes calm again, hardship and suffering start again because people have larvish their money during the periods of ember months. It's about time we stopped this act and take every month as equal with others and spend money judiciously.
